post.description: Provide your username and password as form data to get an access token.

:return: refreshed token
Create a new account with the provided username and password.

Method for adding tags to issues in bulk. The tags and
issue ids should be specified in the request body.

get.description: Get all embeddings and their configs.

post.description: Create a new embedding with the given config.
Update the config of the given embedding.

delete.description: Delete the embedding with the given embedding id

get.description: Get the embedding file for the given embedding.

post.description: Upload embedding file for the given embedding.

delete.description: Delete embedding file for the given embedding.

get.description:
Returns issue data. The returned data is determined by the
specified issue ids and the attributes that are requested.

Returns the issue ids for which the issue tags match
the provided filtering options. These filtering options are
given in the body of the request.

post.description:
Endpoint for downloading or updating the issue data from JiraRepos. When setting
repos to null, the endpoint updates the issue data from all the repos that are
currently in the database. Repos can also be a list of strings, where each string
is a repo name. In this case, the endpoint only updates the issue data from the
specified repos. Optionally, authentication can be used for updating certain repos.
In this case, only specify the repos for which the authentication credentials are
valid.
:param token:
:param request:
:return:

get.description:
Get the information about all the repos that are currently in the database.
:return:

get.description:
Returns the manual labels of the issue ids that were
provided in the request body.

get.description: Returns a list of all models in the database.

post.description: Creates a new model entry with the given config.

get.description: Return the model with the specified model id.

post.description: Update the name and/or config of the model with model_id.

get.description: Get the model versions for the specified model.

post.description: Upload a new version for the given model-id.

get.description: Get the binary file for the given model version.

put.description: Upload a new version for the given model-id.

get.description:
Returns the predicted labels of the specified model version. Set issue_ids to null
to get all predictions. It returns the predictions as a byte stream.
Get a list of all performance results for the given model.

post.description:
Add a performance result for the given model. The performances should be uploaded
as a bytes file.

get.description: Get the requested performance result. It returns the performance as a byte stream.
